roleset.name: to associate with others, both responsive and receptive
roleset.note: INTERACT-V NOTES: Frame created by Arrick (from interact.01-v)
INTERACTION-N NOTES: Based on nouns-00080. Comparison to interact.01. VN class correspond-36.1. Updated by Julia. (from interaction.01-n)

example.name: interact
example.text: When Kao Chao-Cheng has the students play the game of cat-and-mouse *T*, he gets them to interact with each other and move based on their observations of the cat, the mouse and their classmates linked * in a circle.

example.name: If both participants are stated together, use arg 0
example.text: The interactions between health and homelessness

example.name: Both args
example.text: your interactions with the Iraqi civilians in Tikrit Saddam's hometown
